description: Example template for a three-card tarot reading
name: Three Card Spread Template

positions.name: Structures
positions.description: The underlying structures and foundations shaping the situation
positions.interpretation_focus: What structures are at play? What foundations support or constrain?

positions.name: Process
positions.description: The active process and transformation currently unfolding
positions.interpretation_focus: What process is happening? What is transforming or in motion?

positions.name: Possibilities
positions.description: The potential outcomes and emerging possibilities
positions.interpretation_focus: What possibilities are emerging? What potentials are available?

reading_flow: Shuffle cards while focusing on the question
Draw three cards and place in positions 1, 2, 3
Interpret each card in context of its position
Look for connections and story between the cards

example_usage.question: What do I need to know about my current creative project?

cards.interpretation: Your creative journey began with a leap of faith and willingness to try something new.
You're currently in a phase of expansion and planning, looking ahead to possibilities.
The future holds manifestation and skill - you have all the tools you need to succeed.

example_usage.synthesis: This reading shows a journey from innocent beginnings through strategic planning to masterful manifestation. Trust the process.

variations: Mind-Body-Spirit: Replace Structures-Process-Possibilities with these aspects

metadata.note: This template can be adapted for various three-position spreads
